text: Penicillium hirsutum is a species of the genus of Penicillium which causes garlic blue mold on Allium sativum.UniProt Penicillium hirsutum produces cyclopiazonic acid"Low-temperature biology and pathogenicity of Penicillium hirsutum on garlic in storage", P. Bertolini et. al., 1996, https://doi.org/10.1016/S0723-2020(87)80008-5 p. 44 and roquefortine C. ==Further reading== * * * ==References== hirsutum Category:Fungi described in 1901
title: Penicillium hirsutum
